<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Follow Artists or Users"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v1/me/following"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add the current user as a follower of one or more artists or other Spotify users.

**Note:** Authorization scopes- **user-follow-modify**

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"type","description":"The ID type.\n\n**Allowed values:** \"artist\", \"user\"\n\n**Example:** type=artist","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","example":"artist"}},{"name":"ids","description":"A comma-separated list of the artist or the user Spotify IDs. A maximum of 50 IDs can be sent in one request.","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","example":"0Y3agQaa6g2r0YmHPOO9rh,3LOm0AZjpwVQebvkyanjDy,2G0yYOdnPrffB2Mre1XCMv"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ids":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","example":"string"},"example":["string"]}}},"examples":{"Follow Artists or Users":{"value":{"ids":["string"]}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
